lines.text: I shall go to her. Women love me, Caleb. I'm not like you. You're ugly. But I am handsome and delightful. She shall love me, Caleb, as much as she hated you. I am love, total love. I am Lester, and I am alive!
I'm going to awaken you from this earthly nightmare... awaken you to the sweet repose of death.
Your feminine pulchritude is detestable, and you were trying to drain the energy from me!
[awakened by rock music blaring on the radio]
This is a hell of a way to wake up. A cacophony of horse manure.
